function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared holographic displays","Impact":"Spread of illnesses and viruses among individuals who come into contact with the holographic displays","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of the holographic displays, implementation of touchless interaction technology, and enforcement of hygiene practices for users","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection technology, touchless gesture recognition technology, and antimicrobial coatings for surfaces","People":"Users, maintenance staff, and anyone who interacts with the holographic displays","Owner":"Facility managers, technology providers, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Increased risk of infection due to crowded spaces around holographic displays","Impact":"Higher likelihood of transmission of contagious diseases in crowded areas around holographic displays","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of people around the displays, controlling the flow of foot traffic, and maintaining physical distancing measures","Technologies":"Smart crowd management systems, occupancy monitoring technology, and social distancing monitoring solutions","People":"Users, visitors, and bystanders around the holographic displays","Owner":"Facility managers, event organizers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Risk of virus transmission through shared touch surfaces on holographic display interfaces","Impact":"Potential for viruses to spread through touch interaction with the holographic display interfaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of touchless interfaces, regular cleaning and disinfection of touch surfaces, and user education on hygiene practices","Technologies":"Touchless gesture recognition technology, self-cleaning surfaces, and antimicrobial coatings for touch interfaces","People":"Users, maintenance staff, and anyone who interacts with the holographic displays","Owner":"Facility managers, technology providers, and public health authorities"}]}
